title: The application of development permission shall be scrutinised and shall be disposed offwithin the time limit specified in the Act / DCPR or Right to Services Act
clause_text: The application of development permission shall be scrutinised and shall be disposed offwithin the time limit specified in the Act / DCPR or Right to Services Act. The concerned officer shall make site inspection/s as and when required.
section: Duties and Responsibilities of Geotechnical Engineer :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The application of development permission shall be scrutinised and shall be disposed offwithin the time limit specified in the Act / DCPR or Right to Services Act.
